author: akarasulu
msg: Added a test case to verify if the DnParser is correctly parsing and preserving
whitespace after an escaped ',' in a value of the DN.  This was added to try
to reproduce the bug in DIREVE-179 here:

author: epugh
msg: Bug 3588 Allow access to MimeMessage from Email class

author: bnicholes
msg: Don't bother checking empty strings when we already know that the string length is 0. This fixes a false error code of APR_EABOVEROOT when the result of the merge is just a file name with no path of any kind.

author: djencks
msg: Make app client login actually work, and ejb timers actually work

author: jeremias
msg: Improved text painting for PostScript (including letter-space and word-space)
Moved text-decoration painting to the common base class and reused the border line painting method for this purpose.
